title: 84.1525 STROMATOLITES.
text:
A person may not possess, move, or disturb a stromatolite located in waters of the state except under a permit issued by the commissioner.
The commissioner may adopt rules establishing criteria and procedures for:
(1) the issuance of stromatolite permits with reasonable conditions; and
(2) the denial, modification, suspension, or revocation of stromatolite permits for cause.
